pkgmetadata.longdescription: # AXIO to Zarr converterConvert AXIOSCAN dataset to Zarr.NOTE: only those AXIOSCAN datasets with SCMYX dimensions where S=1 are supported at the moment.## Install```pip install axio2zarr```### Requirements* aicspylibczi* click* dask* numpy* xarray* zarray## Usage### From Python script```from axio2zarr import axio2zarraxio2zarr(input_path, output_path)```### From command line```axio2zarr input_path output_path
